```{bash}
# Human Reference Genome Download and Indexing

# The reference genome used in this paper is hg19.

# Software requirements
# BWA (https://github.com/lh3/bwa)
# samtools (http://www.htslib.org/download/)

# Downloading the reference genome
mkdir reference_genome
wget -O human_glk_v37.fasta.gz -P reference_genome/ http://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/technical/reference/human_g1k_v37.fasta.gz
zcat reference_genome/human_glk_v37.fasta.gz | bgzip > reference_genome/human_glk_v37.fasta.gz.1
mv reference_genome/human_glk_v37.fasta.gz.1 reference_genome/human_glk_v37.fasta.gz

# Indexing the reference genome using bwa and samtools
bwa index reference_genome/<reference_genome_name>
samtools faidx reference_genome/<reference_genome_name>
```
